name: Prakhar Agrawal

education.degree: B.Tech. in Computer Science with specialization in Artificial Intelligence

certifications.name: Natural Language Processing with Classification and Vector Spaces
Linear Algebra for Machine Learning and Data Science
Mastering Data Structures and Algorithms Using C++ (Udemy)

projects.name: YOUTUBE AUTO GPT
projects.description: Created a script generator for youtube videos using OpenAI key and Langchain based on LLM. Created title generator for a youtube video.

projects.name: LOGGER
projects.description: Created a logger which can log messages, errors, warnings and also store the same in a circular linked list for easy retrieval and display. Utilized Flask to create the API of the same functionality.

projects.name: WATER POTABILITY CHECK
projects.description: Performed pre-processing and feature engineering on the dataset. Trained the dataset using supervised Machine Learning algorithms with a final accuracy of 95.88% based on the Random Forest Classifier algorithm.

projects.name: IMAGE CAPTIONING
projects.description: Developed a model which generates captions for images using a deep Convolution Neural Network (CNN) and LSTM, achieved an accuracy of 97%.

responsibilities: Designed the database in MongoDB and created REST APIs using Typescript
Implemented the backend of the chat-section (for chat between user and school) using node.js and websockets
Worked on an Abstractive Text Summarization project during the internship period.
Utilized Hugging Face Transformer model for this purpose and achieved about 95% accuracy with the model.

achievements: Led a team of 6 members for Smart India Hackathon 2023 securing 27th position in the college's internal hackathon
Among the top 20 teams in the Comp-a-Thon – Bennett university's hackathon
Participated in 5+ external hackathons including Microsoft Imagine Cup (2023), IBM hackathon, Flipkart Grid 5.0
